name: confusedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in way that shows that you are not thinking clearly or you do not understand something: My father confusedly stirred a teaspoon of salt into his coffee. He stared confusedly at me for several seconds.
in a way that is difficult to understand: The story moves confusedly between the past and the present. A series of strange images flashed confusedly before my eyes.
More examplesFewer examplesShe opened her eyes and peered about confusedly."What on earth was that creature?" my mother asked confusedly.
